channel.title: How do I edit .xml files properly and compile?
channel.description:
I'm quite confused on how to do it, they're in 7zip archives but theres also some in folders aswell, but editing those ones doesn't do anything. Can anyone tell me how to do it? Thanks, i'm trying to make an NPC stand in Falador.... </noob>
[img]http://img29.imageshack.us/img29/5674/84843633.png[/img]
Also I don't know how to compile properly :|, do i just put it in the Input folder and compile/compress depending on weather it's .java or .xml?
kthx - magitek

item.title: How do I edit .xml files properly and compile?
item.dc:creator: @C_R_O_O_K_S C R O O K S
item.description:
@C_R_O_O_K_S wrote:

z2:

You don’t need to compile if you edit XMLs, and you need to download the program 7zip so when you edit the xml file you can re compress it with 7-zip which will compress it back into .xml.gz

Correct.

Read full topic
item.source: How do I edit .xml files properly and compile?
